attributes.action: Make Buslanes Carpool lanes (3+ Passengers in Applicable Vehicles) with temporary use of hardshoulder of busiest motorways on busiest times.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I create a petition for making better use of existing road systems as follows-:
Converting bus lanes into priority carpool express lanes allowing-:
* Vehicles with 2/3 passengers or more wherever applicable (stopping or disallowing vehicles with strong window tints), motorcycles/cycles, buses/minibuses, 7.5 tonne + vehicles, taxis and LPG/Hybrid vehicles (providing mandatory rear window Hybrid/LPG stickers)with carpool exempt stickers for priority group individuals (i.e. unmarked police, disabled, govt officials etc)

Converting the hardshoulder to a congestion lane as follows-:
By allowing use of the hardshoulder during busy periods converting any 3 lane motorway into 4 lanes with breakdowns recieving free recovery 
(similar to roadwork zones)in potentially hazardous motorways.
OR making them priority express carpool lanes during busy periods with the exemptions stated above in the first part of this petition. END

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
